title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Greenfield unlocked: Best practices for expanding new customer engagement-PEX206
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 -绿地解锁：扩展新客户参与的最佳实践-PEX206
abstract: Experience the evolution of greenfield partner programs today. Discover what works and what doesn't through real partner feedback. Grow your new customer engagement practice by combining strategic funding with AI-powered tools and intelligent automation, like our Partner-First Scale model and more. Learn about the right sales motion for every customer need, allowing you to provide more personalized solutions as you streamline your customer's journey from initial engagement to successful implementation. Whether you're a consulting or technology partner, this session will teach you how to leverage AWS's funding, tools, and support to help you start growing your greenfield practice.
abstract_cn: 立即体验全新合作伙伴项目的演进。通过真实合作伙伴反馈了解哪些有效、哪些无效。通过将战略资金与AI驱动的工具和智能自动化相结合，例如我们的合作伙伴优先规模化模型等，发展您的新客户参与实践。了解适合每种客户需求的正确销售策略，使您能够提供更个性化的解决方案，同时简化客户从初始接触到成功实施的全过程。无论您是咨询合作伙伴还是技术合作伙伴，本课程将教您如何利用AWS的资金、工具和支持来帮助您开始发展全新业务实践。

presenter.name: Rehan Shah
presenter.title: Head of Channel and Partner Sales - US GF and T2k
